name: Backend E-commerce Application
description: This is a backend application for an E-commerce webiste that was built using JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js API, Sequelize, and MySQL. This application was created so that a user within a company can compete with other e-commerce companies.

name: Logo Generator
description: This application allows users to be able to generate a logo with three characters, three different options of shapes, and be able to choose the color of the text and shape by just answering four questions with node.js.

name: Social Network API
description: This is a and API for a social network that uses a NoSQL database. So a user's wesite can handle large mamounts of unstructured data.
